revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NAG |model=SNR-CPE |revision=-W4N-3G |asin= |series=N300 |image1= |est_release_date=04/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SkyLink |manuf_model=SL-R7205 |manuf_rev=(XDX-RN502J) V2.0 |availability=now |type=wireless router, CPE, |fcc_id= |pcb_id=XDX-RN502J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3052 |cpu1_cspeed=384 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3052 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.21;Wive-NG-RTNL; |tp_firmware=Wive-NG |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=Admin |oui=F8:F0:82 |oui_eth=F8:F0:82 }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}} :[https://shop.nag.ru/catalog/archive/07735.SNR-CPE-W4N-3G Product page]
"XDX-RN502J V2.0" and "1113" is silkscreened on the [https://shop.nag.ru/uploads/catalog_item_image/3346/IMG_2742.jpg board]. {{see also|China XDX-RN502J V2.0}}
Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/about-wive-ng-mt/ ''Wive-NG-MT'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU) The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''.
===See also=== :[[List of Wive-ng firmware supported devices]] *[[NAG SNR-CPE-ME1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-MD1]] - AC750 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W2N]] - N300 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W4N]] - N300 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W4N-3G]] - N300 Wireless Router *[[NAG SNR-CPE-W4N (rev.M)]] - N300 Wireless Router
